      • init

        @PostConstruct
public void init()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getAcisByPath

        public AciSet getAcisByPath​(RequestCtx ctx)
        Given a path, return all of the ACIs that may apply. This includes ACIs on the full path plus each parent level. The order of acis returned is from longest path first to global.
        Parameters:
        ctx - The RequestCtx for which the ACIs are requested
        Returns:
        An AciSet containing applicable acis in order of resource, container, global acis.

      • getResourceAcis

        public java.util.List<AccessControl> getResourceAcis​(java.lang.String path)
        Used to return the ACIs related to a particular resource. This is used by the Meta object to generate the "acis" operational attribute.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the resource for home the ACIs are to be returned
        Returns:
        A List of AccessControls comprising the ACIs for the resource indicated by path

      • getAcisForResourceContainer

        public AciSet getAcisForResourceContainer​(java.lang.String path)
        Given the path (with slashes) for a container, return the container's ACIs. This includes all ACIs regardless of method or client.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the container to return (e.g. /Users)
        Returns:
        The AciSet containing the ACIs for a particular path.

      • filterRequestandInitAcis

        public boolean filterRequestandInitAcis​(RequestCtx ctx,
                                        io.quarkus.security.identity.SecurityIdentity identity)
        Normally called by the servlet filter to check if the received request is valid an an HTTP level. The method checks that the HTTP Method is correct given the ACIs defined and the actor involved (specified by SecurityIdentity). If authorized, places the set of ACIs and the SecurityIdentity into the RequestCtx object.
        Parameters:
        ctx - The RequestCtx containing the parsed HTTP request.
        identity - The SecurityIdentity performing the request
        Returns:
        true if authorized.
